settings.custom_liquid:
At Patty's Cakes, we're all about flavor! Our cakes are topped and filled with a light, airy icing that strikes the perfect balance between taste and texture, without being too sugary or hard.

We love creating Custom Cakes for any occasion and taste buds. With 11 cake flavors and 22 fillings to choose from, we're sure to make your dessert unforgettable.

Custom Cakes are the perfect way to tailor your cake to your event. You can mix and match flavors, select colors, get creative with the design, and feed any crowd size. We also offer gluten-free and vegan options.

Please keep in mind that we require advance ordering to give your Custom Cake the time and attention it deserves. So plan ahead and let us create a delicious cake for your next celebration, whether it's a birthday, baby shower, bridal shower, religious event, or anything in between!
